description:
Soul Link is a challenging puzzle game where you use your intelligence to build bridges with falling pieces of various shapes. Reconnect this broken land with Soul Bridges, and make the world whole again!

Game Features

-The world of Soul Link is a world of physics! Make good use of the pieces, as well as tenon and mortise structures, to create solid bridges that can withstand mighty storms.
-Embark on a breathtaking adventure through the earth, the sky, and the cosmos. Your bridges will face fierce challenges in a wide variety of landscapes and weather!
-Use your unique skills wisely to overcome insane challenges such as seesaws, floating platforms, storms, lightning, zero gravity, etc.
-"Form follows function." Lose yourself in the tranquil serenity of beautifully crafted Soul Bridges.
name: Soul Link
